feature.label: Java Source Attacher Feature
feature.description: An Eclipse plugin to find and download source code for open source Java libraries automatically from Internet. Just right click on a Java library of a Java-based project and choose "Attach Java Source" menu item, the plugin will search in Maven Central repo to find the source code to download and then will attach source code to your Java library automatically. Enjoy!
